attributes.action: Control drugs and reduce crime by replacing Prohibition by lagalised control
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As suggested by Chief Constable Richard Brunstrom I agree and that the legalisation of all drugs (including Cannabis, Cocaine, Heroin etc)is the only way to address the current drug problems and CRIME.

The number one income of all crime gangs is drugs, and the majority of the increasing crime we experience is largely a result.

Gangs killing each other over territory to sell drugs, or addicts resorting to credit card fraud, burglary or prostitution to pay for their addiction.

The increase violent crime and gun proliferation is all a byproduct of an ineffective policy.

Join with me and Chief Constable Richard Brunstrom to call for a radical review of criminal policy in the UK.

Lets take the cash flow from the criminal distribution network, and enpowert the Police to apply an affective strategy and protects people from criminals not themselves.
